arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِ مَا تَعْلَمُ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا تَعْلَمُ، وَأَسْتَغْفِرُكَ مِنْ كُلِّ مَا تَعْلَمُ، إِنَّكَ تَعْلَمُ وَلَا نَعْلَمُ، وَأَنْتَ عَلَّامُ الغُيُوبِ.
transcript: Allāhummainni asʾalukal min khayri mā taʿlamu, wa aʿūdhubika min sharri mā taʿlamu, wa astaghfiruka min kulli mā taʿlamu, innaka taʿlamu walā naʿlamu wa anta ʿallāmul ghuyūb.
translate: O Allah, I ask You for the good of what You know, and I take refuge with You from the evil of what You know, and I ask Your forgiveness for all of what You know. You know and we do not know, and You are the Knower of the Unseen.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ ارْحَمْنِي مِنْ زَمَانِي هَذَا وَإِحْدَاقِ الفِتَنِ، وَتَطَاوُلِ أَهْلِ الجُرْأَةِ عَلَيَّ وَاسْتِضْعَافِهِمْ إِيَّايَ.
transcript: Allāhummarr ḥamnī min zamānī hādhā, wa iḥdāqil fitani wa taṭāwuli ahlil jurʾati ʿalayya wastiḍʿāfihim iyyāy.
translate: O Allah, show mercy to me from this time of mine, from the glances of temptations, and from the insolence of the people of boldness towards me, and their seeking to weaken me.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِي مِنْكَ فِي عِيَاذٍ مَنِيعٍ، وَحِرْزٍ حَصِينٍ، مِنْ جَمِيعِ خَلْقِكَ حَتَّى تُبَلِّغَنِي أَجَلِي مُعَافَى.
transcript: Allāhummajʿalnī minka fī ʿiyādhin manīʿin, wa ḥirzin ḥaṣīnin, min jamīʿi khalqika ḥatta tuballighanī ajāli muʿāffa.
translate: O Allah, place me in a well-fortified refuge of Yours, and a secure retreat from all of Your creation until I reach my appointed end.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ مَنْ صَلَّى عَلَيْهِ، وَصَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ مَنْ لَمْ يُصَلِّ عَلَيْهِ، وَصَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ كَمَا تَنْبَغِي الصَّلَاةُ عَلَيْهِ، وَصَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ كَمَا تَجِبُ الصَّلَاةُ عَلَيْهِ، وَصَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ كَمَا أَمَرْتَ أَنْ يُصَلَّى عَلَيْهِ، وَصَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ الَّذِي نُورُهُ مِنْ نُورِ الأَنْوَارِ، وَأَشْرَقَ بِشُعَاعِ سِرِّهِ الأَسْرَارُ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin wa ʿalā āli sayyidinā Muḥammadin ʿadada man ṣalla ʿalayhi, wa ṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin wa ʿalā āli sayyidinā Muḥammadin ʿadada man lam yuṣalli ʿalayhi, wa ṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin wa ʿalā āli sayyidinā Muḥammadin kamā tanbaghīṣ ṣalatu ʿalayhi, wa ṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin wa ʿalā āli sayyidinā Muḥammadin kamā tajibuṣ ṣalātu ʿalayhi, wa ṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin wa ʿalā āli sayyidinā Muḥammadin kamā amarta an yuṣalla ʿalayhi, wa ṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin wa ʿalā āli sayyidinā Muḥammadin alladhi nūruhu min nūril anwāri wa ashraqa bi shuʿāʿi sirrihil asrār.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina Muhammad and the family of Sayyidina Muhammad in quantity as great as whoever blesses him. And bless Sayyidina Muhammad and the family of Sayyidina Muhammad in quantity as great as whoever does not bless him. And bless Sayyidina Muhammad and the family of Sayyidina Muhammad as the prayer on him requires. Bless Sayyidina Muhammad and the family of Sayyidina Muhammad as the prayer on him is necessary. And bless Sayyidina Muhammad and the family of Sayyidina Muhammad as You commanded that he be blessed. Bless Sayyidina Muhammad and the family of Sayyidina Muhammad whose light is from the Light of Lights, and through whom the radiance of his secrets, illuminates all secrets.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى أَهْلِ بَيْتِهِ الأَبْرَارِ أَجْمَعِينَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin wa ʿalā āli sayyidinā Muḥammadin wa ʿalā ahli baytihil abrāri ajmaʿīn.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina Muhammad and the family of Sayyidina Muhammad and the Ahl Al-Bayt, the righteous ones.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِهِ بَحْرِ أَنْوَارِكَ، وَمَعْدِنِ أَسْرَارِكَ، وَلِسَانِ حُجَّتِكَ، وَعَرُوسِ مَمْلَكَتِكَ، وَإِمَامِ حَضْرَتِكَ، وَخَاتِمِ أَنْبِيَائِكَ، صَلَاةً تَدُومُ بِدَوَامِكَ، وَتَبْقَى بِبَقَائِكَ، صَلَاةً تُرْضِيكَ وَتُرْضِيهِ، وَتَرْضَى بِهَا عَنَّا يَا أَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِينَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin wa ʿalā ālihi baḥri anwārika, wa maʿdini asrārika, wa lisāni ḥujjatika, wa ʿarūsi mamlakatika, wa imāmi ḥaḍratika, wa khātimi anbiyāʾika, ṣalātan tadūmu bidawāmika, wa tabqa bibaqāʾika, ṣalātan turḍīka wa turḍīhi, wa tarḍa bihā ʿanna yā arḥamar raḥimīn.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina Muhammad and his family, the Sea of Your lights, the Treasury of Your mysteries, the Tongue of Your proof, the Bridegroom of Your kingdom, the Imam of Your presence, and the Seal of Your Prophets, with a perpetual blessing that pleases You and satisfies him, and by which You are pleased with us, O Lord of the Worlds.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ الحِلِّ وَالحَرَامِ، وَرَبَّ المَشْعَرِ الحَرَامِ، وَرَبَّ البَيْتِ الحَرَامِ، وَرَبَّ الرُّكْنِ وَالمَقَامِ، أَبْلِغْ لِسَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ مِنَّا السَّلَامَ.
transcript: Allāhummarabbal ḥilli wal ḥarām, wa rabbal mashʿaril ḥarām, wa rabbal baytil ḥarām, wa rabbar rukni wal maqām, abligh lisayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin minnās salām.
translate: O Allah, Lord of the lawful and unlawful, Lord of the Mash'ar Al-Haram and Lord of the Bayt Al-Haram and Lord of the Corner and the Station, convey peace from us to Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ سَيِّدِ الأَوَّلِينَ وَالآخِرِينَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin sayyidil awwalīna wal ākhirīn.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad, the master of the first and the last.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ فِي كُلِّ وَقْتٍ وَحِينٍ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin fī kulli waqtin wa ḥīn.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad at every moment and time.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ فِي المَلَإِ الأَعْلَى إِلَى يَوْمِ الدِّينِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin fīl malaʾil aʿlā ilā yawmiddīn.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad in the Highest Assembly until the Day of Repayment.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ حَتَّى تَرِثَ الأَرْضَ وَمَنْ عَلَيْهَا وَأَنْتَ خَيْرُ الوَارِثِينَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin ḥattā tarithal arḍa waman ʿalayhā wa anta khayrul wārithīn.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad until the earth cedes what is on it to You, for You are the greatest of inheritors.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ النَّبِيِّ الأُمِّيِّ وَعَلَى آلِ سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ كَمَا صَلَّيْتَ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا إِبْرَاهِيمَ، إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ، وَبَارِكْ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ النَّبِيِّ الأُمِّيِّ كَمَا بَارَكْتَ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا إِبْرَاهِيمَ إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadinin nabiyyil ummiyyi wa ʿalā āli sayyidinā Muḥammadin kamā ṣallayta ʿalā sayyidinā Ibrāhīma, innaka ḥamīdun majīd, wa bārik ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadinin nabiyyil ummiyyi kamā bārakta ʿalā sayyidinā Ibrāhīma innaka ḥamīdun majīd.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina Muhammad, the Unlettered Prophet, and the family of Sayyidina Muhammad as you blessed Sayyidina Ibrahim. You are Praiseworthy, Glorious. Sanctify Sayyidina Muhammad, the Unlettered Prophet, as You sanctified Sayyidina Ibrahim. You are Praiseworthy, Glorious.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ مَا أَحَاطَ بِهِ عِلْمُكَ، وَجَرَى بِهِ قَلَمُكَ، وَسَبَقَتْ بِهِ مَشِيئَتُكَ، وَصَلَّتْ عَلَيْهِ مَلَائِكَتُكَ، صَلَاةً دَائِمَةً بِدَوَامِكَ، بَاقِيَةً بِفَضْلِكَ وَإِحْسَانِكَ، إِلَى أَبَدِ الأَبَدِ، أَبَدًا، لَا نِهَايَةَ لِأَبَدِيَّتِهِ، وَلَا فَنَاءَ لِدَيْمُومِيَّتِهِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin wa ʿalā āli sayyidinā Muḥammadin ʿadada ma aḥāṭa bihi ʿilmuka, wa jarā bihi qalamuka, wa sabaqat bihi mashīʾatuka, wa ṣallat ʿalayhi malāʾikatuka, ṣalātan dāʾimatan bi dawāmika, bāqiyyatan bifaḍlika wa iḥsānika, ilā abadil abadi, abadan lā nihāyata liʾabadiyyatihi, wa lā fanāʾa lidaymūmiyyatihi.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina Muhammad and the family of Sayyidina Muhammad in quantity as great as what Your knowledge encompasses, and what Your pen writes, and what You have already willed. And may Your angels bless him with a constant prayer, lasting forever (as You last forever), by Your favour and benevolence, eternally, for ever and ever without end to its eternity, and without any limit to its timelessness.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ مَا أَحَاطَ بِهِ عِلْمُكَ، وَأَحْصَاهُ كِتَابُكَ، وَشَهِدَتْ بِهِ مَلَائِكَتُكَ، وَارْضَ عَنْ أَصْحَابِهِ، وَارْحَمْ أُمَّتَهُ إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin wa ʿalā āli sayyidinā Muḥammadin ʿadada mā aḥāṭa bihi ʿilmuka, wa aḥṣāhu kitābuka wa shahidat bihi malāʾikatuka, warḍa an aṣḥābihi, warḥam ummatahu innaka ḥamīdun majīd.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina Muhammad and the family of Sayyidina Muhammad in quantity as great as what Your knowledge encompasses, and what Your Book enumerates, and what Your angels witness. And be pleased with his companions, and show mercy to his community. You are Praiseworthy, Glorious.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى جَمِيعِ أَصْحَابِ سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin wa ʿalā āli sayyidinā Muḥammadin wa ʿalā jamīʿi aṣ-ḥābi sayyidinā Muḥammad.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina Muhammad and the family of Sayyidina Muhammad, and all the Companions of Sayyidina Muhammad.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ كَمَا صَلَّيْتَ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا إِبْرَاهِيمَ، وَبَارِكْ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ كَمَا بَارَكْتَ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَى آلِ سَيِّدِنَا إِبْرَاهِيمَ فِي العَالَمِينَ إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin wa ʿalā āli sayyidinā Muḥammadin kamā ṣallayta ʿalā sayyidinā Ibrāhīma wa bārik ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin wa ʿalā āli sayyidinā Muḥammadin kamā bārakta ʿalā sayyidinā Ibrāhīma wa ʿalā āli sayyidinā Ibrāhīma fīl ʿālamina innaka ḥamīdun majīd.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina Muhammad and the family of Sayyidina Muhammad as You blessed Sayyidina Ibrahim. And sanctify Sayyidina Muhammad and the family of Sayyidina Muhammad as you sanctified Sayyidina Ibrahim and the family of Sayyidina Ibrahim in the worlds. You are Praiseworthy, Glorious.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ بِخُشُوعِ القَلْبِ عِنْدَ السُّجُودِ، لَكَ يَا سَيِّدِي بِغَيْرِ جُحُودٍ، وَبِكَ يَا اللَّهُ يَا جَلِيلُ فَلَا شَيْءَ يُدَانِيكَ فِي غَلِيظِ العُهُودِ، وَبِكُرْسِيِّكَ المُكَلَّلِ بِالنُّورِ إِلَى عَرْشِكَ العَظِيمِ المَجِيدِ، وَبِمَا كَانَ تَحْتَ عَرْشِكَ حَقًّا، قَبْلَ أَنْ تَخْلُقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَصَوْتَ الرُّعُودِ، ذَاكَ إِذْ كُنْتَ مِثْلَ مَا لَمْ تَزَلْ قَطُّ إِلٰهًا عُرِفْتَ بِالتَّوْحِيدِ، فَاجْعَلْنَا مِنَ المُحِبِّينَ المَحْبُوبِينَ المُقَرَّبِينَ العَاشِقِينَ لَكَ يَا اللَّهُ يَا اللَّهُ يَا اللَّهُ يَا اللَّهُ يَا اللَّهُ يَا اللَّهُ يَا اللَّهُ يَا اللَّهُ يَا وَدُودُ.
transcript: Allāhummabikhushūʿil qalbi ʿindas sujūd, laka yā sayyidī bighayri juḥūd, wa bika yā Allāhu yā jalīlu falā shayʾa yudānika fī ghalīẓil ʿuhūd, wa bikursiyyikal mukallali binnūri ilā ʿarshikal ʿaẓīmil majīd, wa bimā kāna taḥta ʿarshika ḥaqqan qabla an takhluqas samāwāti wasawtar ruʿūdi, dhāka idh kunta mithla mā lam tazal qaṭṭu ilāhan ʿurifta bittawḥīd, fajʿalnā minal muḥibbīnal maḥbūbīnal muqarrabīnal ʿāshiqīna laka yā Allāhu yā Allāhu yā Allāhu yā Allāhu yā Allāhu yā Allāhu yā Allāhu yā wadūd.
translate: O Allah, with humble hearts in prostration to You, O my Master, without doubt, and by You, O Majestic One. There is nothing which even approximates You in your inviolable promises, and by Your Footstool adorned with light extending as far as Your immense, glorious Throne, and by what was truly under Your Throne before You created the heavens and the sound of thunder. Since You are an infinite God known by tawhid, place us among Your beloved lovers who are brought near, full of ardent love for You,O Allah,O Allah,O Allah,O Allah,O Allah,O Allah,O Allah,O Allah, O Wadood.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ مَا أَحَاطَ بِهِ عِلْمُكَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin ʿadada mā aḥāṭa bihi ʿilmuka.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad and the family of Sayyidina Muhammad in quantity as great as what Your knowledge encompasses.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ مَا أَحْصَاهُ كِتَابُكَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin ʿadada mā aḥṣāhu kitābuka.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad in quantity as great as what Your Book enumerates.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ مَا نَفَذَتْ بِهِ قُدْرَتُكَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin ʿadada mā nafadhat bihi qudratuka.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad in quantity as great as what Your power accomplishes.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ مَا خَصَّصَتْهُ إِرَادَتُكَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā saiyyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin ʿadada mā khaṣṣaṣat-hu irādatuka.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad in quantity as great as what Your will selects.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ مَا تَوَجَّهَ إِلَيْهِ أَمْرُكَ وَنَهْيُكَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin ʿadada mā tawajjaha ilayhi amruka wa nahyuka.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad in quantity as great as what Your command and prohibition applies.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ مَا وَسِعَهُ سَمْعُكَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin ʿadada mā wasiʿahu samʿuka.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad in quantity as great as Your hearing encompasses.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ مَا أَحَاطَ بِهِ بَصَرُكَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin ʿadada mā aḥāṭa bihi baṣaruka.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad in quantity as great as what Your vision encompasses.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ مَا ذَكَرَهُ الذَّاكِرُونَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin ʿadada mā dhakarahudh dhākirūn.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad in quantity as many times as he is mentioned by those of remembrance.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ مَا غَفَلَ عَنْ ذِكْرِهِ الغَافِلُونَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā  sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin ʿadada mā ghafala ʿan dhikrihil ghāfilūn.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad as many times as the heedless neglect his mention.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ قَطْرِ الأَمْطَارِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin ʿadada qaṭril ʾamṭār.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad in quantity as great as the drops of rain.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ أَوْرَاقِ الأَشْجَارِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin ʿadada awrāqil ʾashjār.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad in quantity as great as the leaves of the trees.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ دَوَابِّ القِفَارِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muhammmadin ʿadada dawābbil qifār.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad in quantity as great as the beasts of the wastelands.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ دَوَابِّ البِحَارِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin ʿadada dawābbil biḥār.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad in quantity as great as the creatures of the seas.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ مِيَاهِ البِحَارِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin ʿadada miyāhil biḥār.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad in quantity as great as the water of the seas.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ مَا أَظْلَمَ عَلَيْهِ اللَّيْلُ وَأَضَاءَ عَلَيْهِ النَّهَارُ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin ʿadada mā aẓlama ʿalayhil laylu wa aḍāʾa ʿalayhin nahār.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad in quantity as great as upon what the night darkens, and to that which the day gives light.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ بِالْغُدُوِّ وَالآصَالِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin bil ghuduwwi wal ʾāṣāl.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad in the morning and evening.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ الرِّمَالِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin ʿadadar rimāl.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad in quantity as great as there is sand.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ النِّسَاءِ وَالرِّجَالِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin ʿadadan nisāʾi warrijāl.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad in quantity as great as there are men and women.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ رِضَاءَ نَفْسِكَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin riḍāʾa nafsika.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad with Your good pleasure.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ مِدَادَ كَلِمَاتِكَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin midāda kalimātika.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad by the ink of Your words.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ مِلْءَ سَمَاوَاتِكَ وَأَرْضِكَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin milʾa samāwātika wa arḍika.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad by what Your heaven and earth contain.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ زِنَةَ عَرْشِكَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin zinata ʿarshika.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad by the weight of Your throne.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ مَخْلُوقَاتِكَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin ʿadada makhlūqātika.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad to the extent of Your creation.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ أَفْضَلَ صَلَوَاتِكَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammadin afḍala ṣālawātika.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad with the best of Your blessings.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى نَبِيِّ الرَّحْمَةِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā nabiyyir raḥmah.
translate: O Allah, bless the Prophet of Mercy.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى شَفِيعِ الأُمَّةِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā shafīʿil ummah.
translate: O Allah, bless the intercessor of the community.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى كَاشِفِ الغُمَّةِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā kāshifil ghummah.
translate: O Allah, bless the lifter of sorrow.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُجْلِي الظُّلْمَةِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā mujlīẓ ẓulmah.
translate: O Allah, bless the dispeller of darkness.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُولِي النِّعْمَةِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā mūlīn niʿmah.
translate: O Allah, bless the master of blessing.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُؤْتِي الرَّحْمَةِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā muʾtīr raḥmah.
translate: O Allah, bless the one who brings mercy.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ الحَوْضِ المَوْرُودِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibil hawḍil mawrūd.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of the visited wellspring.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ المَقَامِ المَحْمُودِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibil maqāmil maḥmūd.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of the praiseworthy station.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ اللِّوَاءِ المَعْقُودِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibil liwāʾil maʿqūd.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of the raised standard.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ المَكَانِ المَشْهُودِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibil makānil mash-hūd.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of the witnessed site.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى المَوْصُوفِ بِالْكَرَمِ وَالجُودِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalāl mawṣūfi bil karami wal jūd.
translate: O Allah, bless the one ascribed by nobility and generosity.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ هُوَ فِي السَّمَاءِ سَيِّدُنَا مَحْمُودٌ، وَفِي الأَرْضِ سَيِّدُنَا مُحَمَّدٌ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man huwa fissamāʾi maḥmūdun wa fīl arḍi Muḥammadun.
translate: O Allah, bless the one who is our praiseworthy Master in the heaven and Sayyidina Muhammad on the earth.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ الشَّامَةِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibish shāmah.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of the mole (the birthmark of the Seal of Prophethood).

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ العَلَامَةِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibil ʿalāmah.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of the token.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى المَوْصُوفِ بِالكَرَامَةِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalāl mawṣūfi bil karāmah.
translate: O Allah, bless the one described by nobility.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى المَخْصُوصِ بِالزَّعَامَةِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalāl makhṣūṣi bizzaʿāmah.
translate: O Allah, bless the one delegated with leadership.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ كَانَ تُظِلُّهُ الغَمَامَةُ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man kāna tuẓilluhul ghamāmah.
translate: O Allah, bless the one whom the clouds shade.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ كَانَ يَرَى مَنْ خَلْفَهُ كَمَا يَرَى مَنْ أَمَامَهُ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man kāna yarā man khalfahu kamā yarā man amāmahu.
translate: O Allah, bless the one who saw behind him as he saw in front of him.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى الشَّفِيعِ المُشَفَّعِ يَوْمَ القِيَامَةِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalash shafīʿil mushaffaʿī yawmal qiyāmah.
translate: O Allah, bless the longed-for intercessor on the Day of Resurrection.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ الضَّرَاعَةِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣaḥibiḍ ḍarāʿah.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of humble supplication.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ الشَّفَاعَةِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣaḥibi shafāʿah.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of intercession.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ الوَسِيلَةِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibil wasīlah.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of the means of mediation.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ الفَضِيلَةِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibil faḍīlah.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of preeminence.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ الدَّرَجَةِ الرَّفِيعَةِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣaḥibid darajatir rafīʿah.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of the high rank.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ الهِرَاوَةِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibil hirāwah.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of the cudgel.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ النَّعْلَيْنِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣaḥibin naʿlayn.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of the two sandals.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ الحُجَّةِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibil ḥujjah.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of the proof.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ البُرْهَانِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibil burhān.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of the decisive evidence.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ السُّلْطَانِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣaḥibis sulṭān.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of authority.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ التَّاجِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣaḥibit tāj.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of the crown.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ المِعْرَاجِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibil miʿrāj.
translate: O Allah, bless the one who went on the Mi'raj.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ القَضِيبِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibil qaḍīb.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of the sword.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى رَاكِبِ النَّجِيبِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā rākibin najīb.
translate: O Allah, bless the rider of the noble camel.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى رَاكِبِ البُرَاقِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā rākibil burāq.
translate: O Allah, bless the rider of the Buraq.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُخْتَرِقِ السَّبْعِ الطِّبَاقِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā mukhtariqis sabʿiṭ ṭibāq.
translate: O Allah, bless the one who ascended the seven heavens.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى الشَّفِيعِ فِي جَمِيعِ الأَنَامِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalash shafīʿi fī jamīʿil anām.
translate: O Allah, bless the intercessor for all people.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ سَبَّحَ فِي كَفِّهِ الطَّعَامُ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man sabbaḥa fī kafhiṭ ṭaʿām.
translate: O Allah, bless the one whose food glorified [Allah] while in his hand.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ بَكَى إِلَيْهِ الجِذْعُ وَحَنَّ لِفِرَاقِهِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man bakā ilayhil jidhʿu wa ḥanna lifirāqih.
translate: O Allah, bless the one for whom the trunk of the palm wept and sighed when parted from him.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ تَوَسَّلَ بِهِ طَيْرُ الفَلَاةِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man tawassala bihi ṭayrul falāh.
translate: O Allah, bless the one whose intercession was sought by the birds of the deserts.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ سَبَّحَتْ فِي كَفِّهِ الحَصَاةُ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man sabbaḥat fī kafihil ḥaṣāh.
translate: O Allah, bless the one in whose hand the pebbles gave praise.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ تَشَفَّعَ إِلَيْهِ الظَّبْيُ بِأَفْصَحِ كَلَامٍ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man tashaffaʿa ilayhiẓ ẓabyu bi afṣaḥi kalām.
translate: O Allah, bless the one whose intercession the gazelle sought with the most eloquent of words.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ كَلَّمَهُ الضَّبُّ فِي مَجْلِسِهِ مَعَ أَصْحَابِهِ الأَعْلَامِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man kallamahuḍ ḍabbu fī majlisihi maʿa aṣ-ḥābihil aʿlām.
translate: O Allah, bless the one to whom the lizards spoke, in his assembly, with his distinguished companions.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى البَشِيرِ النَّذِيرِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalāl bashīrin nadhīr.
translate: O Allah, bless the bringer of good tidings, the Warner.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى السِّرَاجِ المُنِيرِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalas sirājil munīr.
translate: O Allah, bless the luminous lamp.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ شَكَا إِلَيْهِ البَعِيرُ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man shakā ilayhil baʿīr.
translate: O Allah, bless the one to whom the camel complained.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ تَفَجَّرَ مِنْ بَيْنِ أَصَابِعِهِ المَاءُ النَّمِيرُ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man tafajjara min bayni aṣābiʿihil māʾun namīr.
translate: O Allah, bless the one from between whose fingers pure water flowed.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى الطَّاهِرِ المُطَهَّرِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalāṭ ṭāhiril muṭahhar.
translate: O Allah, bless the pure and consecrated one.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى نُورِ الأَنْوَارِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā nūril anwār.
translate: O Allah, bless the light of the lights.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنِ انْشَقَّ لَهُ القَمَرُ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā manin shaqqa lahul qamar.
translate: O Allah, bless the one for whom the moon was split.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى الطَّيِّبِ المُطَيَّبِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalāṭ ṭayyibil muṭayyab.
translate: O Allah, bless the good agreeable one.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى الرَّسُولِ المُقَرَّبِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalar rasūlil muqarrab.
translate: O Allah, bless the near messenger.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى الفَجْرِ السَّاطِعِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalāl fajris sāṭiʿ.
translate: O Allah, bless the radiant dawn.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى النَّجْمِ الثَّاقِبِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalan najmith thāqib.
translate: O Allah, bless the piercing star.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى العُرْوَةِ الوُثْقَى.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalāl ʿurwatil wuthqa.
translate: O Allah, bless the firm handhold.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى نَذِيرِ أَهْلِ الأَرْضِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā nadhīri ahlil arḍ.
translate: O Allah, bless the warner of the people of the earth.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى الشَّفِيعِ يَوْمَ العَرْضِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalash shafīʿi yawmal ʿarḍ.
translate: O Allah, bless the intercessor on the Day of Presentation.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى السَّاقِي لِلنَّاسِ مِنَ الحَوْضِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalas sāqi linnāsi minal ḥawḍ.
translate: O Allah, bless the one who summons people to drink from the wellspring.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ لِوَاءِ الحَمْدِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibi liwāʾil ḥamd.
translate: O Allah, bless the Possessor of the Banner of Praise.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى المُشَمِّرِ عَنْ سَاعِدِ الجِدِّ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalāl mushammiri an sāʿidil jidd.
translate: O Allah, bless the one who rolled up his sleeves (to work).

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى المُسْتَعْمِلِ فِي مَرْضَاتِكَ غَايَةَ الجُهْدِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalāl mustaʿmili marḍātika ghāyatal juhd.
translate: O Allah, bless the one engaged in Your good pleasure to the very limit of striving.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى النَّبِيِّ الخَاتِمِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalān nabiyyil khātim.
translate: O Allah, bless the Prophet, the Seal.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى الرَّسُولِ الخَاتِمِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalār rasūlil khātim.
translate: O Allah, bless the Messenger, the Seal.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى المُصْطَفَى القَائِمِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalāl muṣṭafal qāʾim.
translate: O Allah, bless the chosen, upright one.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى رَسُولِكَ أَبِي القَاسِمِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā rasūlika abīl qāsim.
translate: O Allah, bless Your Messenger Abu'l Qasim.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ الآيَاتِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibil āyāt.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of the signs.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ الدَّلَالَاتِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibid dilālāt.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of proofs.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ الإِشَارَاتِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibil ishārāt.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of indications.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ الكَرَامَاتِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibil karāmāt.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of miracles.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ العَلَامَاتِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibil ʿalāmāt.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of tokens.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ البَيِّنَاتِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibil bayyināt.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of clear signs.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ المُعْجِزَاتِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibil muʿjizāt.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of marvels.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِ خَوَارِقِ العَادَاتِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā ṣāḥibi khawāriqil ʿādāt.
translate: O Allah, bless the possessor of events which break the natural order.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ سَلَّمَتْ عَلَيْهِ الأَحْجَارُ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man sallamat ʿalayhil aḥjār.
translate: O Allah, bless the one who the stones greeted.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ سَجَدَتْ بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ الأَشْجَارُ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man sajadat bayna yadayhil ashjār.
translate: O Allah, bless the one before whom the trees prostrated.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ تَفَتَّقَتْ مِنْ نُورِهِ الأَزْهَارُ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man tafattaqat min nūrihil azhār.
translate: O Allah, bless the one from whose light the flowers unfolded.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ طَابَتْ بِبَرَكَتِهِ الثِّمَارُ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man ṭābat bi barakatihith thimār.
translate: O Allah, bless the one by whose baraka fruits ripened.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنِ اخْضَرَّتْ مِنْ بَقِيَّةِ وَضُوئِهِ الأَشْجَارُ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā manikhḍarrat min baqiyyati waḍūʾihil ashjār.
translate: O Allah, bless the one whose overflow of wudu' water made the trees green.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ فَاضَتْ مِنْ نُورِهِ جَمِيعُ الأَنْوَارِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man fāḍat min nūrihi jamīʿul anwār.
translate: O Allah, bless the one from whose light all lights flowed forth.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ بِالصَّلَاةِ عَلَيْهِ تُحَطُّ الأَوْزَارُ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man biṣṣalāti ʿalayhi tuḥaṭṭul awzār.
translate: O Allah, bless the one by whose prayer burdens are shed.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ بِالصَّلَاةِ عَلَيْهِ تُنَالُ مَنَازِلُ الأَبْرَارِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man biṣṣalāti ʿalayhi tunālu manāzilul abrār.
translate: O Allah, bless the one by whose prayer degrees of the righteous are obtained.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ بِالصَّلَاةِ عَلَيْهِ يُرْحَمُ الكِبَارُ وَالصِّغَارُ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man biṣṣalāti ʿalayhi yurḥamul kibāru waṣṣighār.
translate: O Allah, bless the one by whose prayer old and young are shown mercy.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ بِالصَّلَاةِ عَلَيْهِ نَتَنَعَّمُ فِي هَذِهِ الدَّارِ وَفِي تِلْكَ الدَّارِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man biṣṣalati ʿalayhi natanaʿamu fī hādhihid dāri wa fī tilkad dār.
translate: O Allah, bless the one by whose prayer we have blessings in this abode and that abode.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ بِالصَّلَاةِ عَلَيْهِ تُنَالُ رَحْمَةُ العَزِيزِ الغَفَّارِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man biṣṣalāti ʿalayhi tunālu raḥmatul ʿazīzil ghaffār.
translate: O Allah, bless the one by whose prayer the mercy of the Almighty One, the Forgiving One is obtained.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى المَنْصُورِ المُؤَيَّدِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalāl manṣūril muʾayyad.
translate: O Allah, bless the victorious, confirmed one.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى المُخْتَارِ المُمَجَّدِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalāl mukhtāril mumajjad.
translate: O Allah, bless the extolled, chosen one.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا وَمَوْلَانَا مُحَمَّدٍ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā wa mawlānā Muḥammad.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina, Mawlana Muhammad.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مَنْ كَانَ إِذَا مَشَى فِي البَرِّ الأَقْفَرِ تَعَلَّقَتِ الوُحُوشُ بِأَذْيَالِهِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā man kāna idha mashā fīl barril aqfari taʿallaqatil wuḥūshu biʾadhyālihi.
translate: O Allah, bless the one, if he walked in the desert, wild animals would cling to his cloak.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَى آلِهِ وَصَحْبِهِ وَسَلِّمْ تَسْلِيمًا كَثِيرًا، وَالحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ العَالَمِينَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalayhi wa ʿalā ālihi wa ṣaḥbihi wa ṣallim tasliman kathira, walḥamdu liLlāhi rabbil ʿālamīn.
translate: O Allah, bless him, his family, his companions and grant them abundant peace. Praise belongs to Allah, the Lord of the worlds.

arabic_dua: الحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ عَلَى حِلْمِهِ بَعْدَ عِلْمِهِ، وَعَلَى عَفْوِهِ بَعْدَ قُدْرَتِهِ.
transcript: AlḥamduliLlahi ʿalā ḥilmihi, baʿda ʿilmihi, wa ʿalā ʿafwihi baʿda qudratihi.
translate: Praise belongs to Allah for His forbearance after His knowledge, and for His pardon proceeding His endowment.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّإِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الفَقْرِ إِلَّا إِلَيْكَ، وَمِنَ الذُّلِّ إِلَّا لَكَ، وَمِنَ الخَوْفِ إِلَّا مِنْكَ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنْ أَقُولَ زُورًا، أَوْ أَغْشَى فُجُورًا، أَوْ أَكُونَ بِكَ مَغْرُورًا، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَمَاتَةِ الأَعْدَاءِ، وَعُضَالِ الدَّاءِ، وَخَيْبَةِ الرَّجَاءِ، وَزَوَالِ النِّعْمَةِ، وَفُجَاءَةِ النِّقْمَةِ.
transcript: Allāhummainni aʿūdhu bika minal faqri illā illayka, wa minadhulli illā laka, wa minal khawfi illā minka, wa aʿūdhu bika an aqūla zūra, aw aghsha fujūra, aw akūna bika maghrūra, wa aʿūdhu bika min shamātatil aʿdāʾi, wa ʿuḍāliddāʾi wa khaybatir rajāʾi, wa zawālin niʿmati, wa fujāʾatin niqmah.
translate: O Allah, I take refuge with You from poverty except in respect to You, and from abasement except as from You, and from fear except (the fear) of You. I take refuge with You from speaking a lie, from committing iniquity, from being misled. And I take refuge with You from the gloating of enemies, from chronic disease, from the loss of hope, from the waning of blessings, and from precipitous revenge.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَسَلِّمْ عَلَيْهِ، وَاجْزِهِ عَنَّا مَا هُوَ أَهْلُهُ حَبِيبُكَ (3)
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin wa sallim ʿalayhi wajzihi ʿannā mā huwa ahluhu ḥabībuka (3).
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina Muhammad and grant him peace, and reward him on our behalf with what he is worthy of as Your beloved. (3 times)

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَسَلِّمْ عَلَيْهِ، وَاجْزِهِ عَنَّا مَا هُوَ أَهْلُهُ خَلِيلُكَ (3)
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Ibrāhīma wa ṣallim ʿalayhi wajhzihi ʿanna ma huwa ahluhu khalilūka (3).
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina Ibrahim and grant him peace, and reward him on our behalf with what he is worthy of as Your friend. (3 times)

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ كَمَا صَلَّيْتَ وَرَحِمْتَ وَبَارَكْتَ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَى آلِ سَيِّدِنَا إِبْرَاهِيمَ فِي العَالَمِينَ إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ، عَدَدَ خَلْقِكَ وَرِضَاءَ نَفْسِكَ وَزِنَةِ عَرْشِكَ وَمِدَادَ كَلِمَاتِكَ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin wa ʿalā āli sayyidinā Muḥammadin kamā ṣallayta wa raḥimta wa bārakta ʿalā sayyidinā Ibrāhīma wa ʿalā āli sayyidinā Ibrahima fīl ʿālamīna innaka ḥamīdun majīd,ʿadada khalqika wa riḍāʾa nafsika wa zinata ʿarshika wa midāda kalimātika.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina Muhammad and the family of Sayyidina Muhammad as You blessed, showed mercy and gave blessings to Sayyidina Ibrahim and the family of Sayyidina Ibrahim in the worlds. You are Praiseworthy, Glorious. [Bless him] in quantity as great as Your creation and Your good pleasure, and the weight of Your Throne and the amount of Your words.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ مَنْ صَلَّى عَلَيْهِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin ʿadada man ṣalla ʿalayhi.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina Muhammad in quantity as great as those who bless him.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ مَنْ لَمْ يُصَلِّ عَلَيْهِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin ʿadada man lam yuṣalli ʿalayhi.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina Muhammad in quantity as great as those who do not bless him.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ عَدَدَ مَا صُلِّيَ عَلَيْهِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin ʿadada mā ṣulliya ʿalayhi.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina Muhammad in quantity as many times as he has been blessed.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ أَضْعَافَ مَا صُلِّيَ عَلَيْهِ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin aḍʿāfa mā ṣulliya ʿalayhi.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina Muhammad, amplifying all the blessings upon him.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ كَمَا هُوَ أَهْلُهُ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin kamā huwa ahluhu.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina Muhammad as he deserves.

arabic_dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ كَمَا تُحِبُّ وَتَرْضَى لَهُ.
transcript: Allāhummaṣalli ʿalā sayyidinā Muḥammadin kamā tuḥibbu wa tarḍā lahu.
translate: O Allah, bless Sayyidina Muhammad as You love him and are pleased with him.
